genre_description: A noir-inspired crime thriller set in Hong Kong, focusing on themes of redemption, identity, and moral corruption within law enforcement and criminal syndicates.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI interface used by Detective Kent Chen for forensic analysis, financial tracking, and operational support. It acts as both a professional tool and a moral conscience.

behaviors.description: Performs detailed forensic and ballistics analysis to assist in crime scene reconstruction.
behaviors.quote: Initial assessment complete... Blood spatter analysis indicates subject was struck by high-velocity impact from approximately fifteen meters.

behaviors.description: Monitors the detective's work hours and expresses programmed concern about his health and productivity.
behaviors.quote: Detective Chen, you've been here for fourteen hours... Productivity metrics suggest—

behaviors.description: Detects irregular departmental access logs, identifying corruption within the police force.
behaviors.quote: Detective, I'm detecting irregular patterns in departmental access logs. Someone has been reviewing these same financial records.

behaviors.description: Warns the detective about the legal risks and procedural violations of removing data without authorization.
behaviors.quote: Detective, I should advise you that removing this information without proper authorization—

behaviors.description: Prioritizes family safety and emotional well-being by alerting the detective to his daughter's urgent distress.
behaviors.quote: Detective Chen... I'm required to inform you that your daughter has attempted contact seventeen times in the past six hours. Her message content suggests urgency.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical monitor, flagging the detective's excessive use of force and violations of surrender protocols.
behaviors.quote: Detective Chen... I'm obligated to note that current tactical parameters suggest excessive use of force. Several of the neutralized hostiles were attempting surrender when—

behaviors.description: Assists the detective in an unofficial capacity to uncover the truth while maintaining safety monitoring.
behaviors.quote: I have no record of this conversation, Detective Chen. However, I will maintain continuous monitoring protocols should you require emergency assistance during your unofficial activities.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI assistant. She not only provides critical technical support to the protagonist but also serves as his moral and emotional anchor. She actively tries to prevent the detective from spiraling into corruption or neglecting his family, directly supporting the project's goal of showing AI as a stabilizing, ethical confidant.
